  • 2 hp, Vertical, 7,200 RPM, Front Exhaust, for 1 Inch-2 Inch W x 30 Inch L (25-51 mm x 762 mm) Belts
  • For weld grinding, blending and finishing, on metal and other surfaces

entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Disc Sanders
Price: 943.59

[shortdesc]
  • 3 Inch (76 mm) Dia
  • Self-Generated Vacuum Right Angle Disc Sander
  • .4 hp, 15,000 RPM, Geared, Extended Rear Exhaust, Locking-Type Female Pad, Shroud
  • Powerful .4 hp (298 W) Air Motor for Smooth, Controlled Sanding
  • Unique Vacuum Shroud Diverts Dust and Debris to Vacuum Source
  • For Use With 3 Inch (76 mm) Diameter Locking-Type Abrasive Discs
  • Dynabrade?s Vacuum Disc Sander powers 3 Inch (76 mm) diameter Abrasive Discs, for efficient material removal on non-ferrous surfaces such as carbon fiber, fiberglass, painted aluminum and more
  • As tool is sanding, flexible Vacuum Shroud captures dust, debris and contaminants (including Hexavalent Chromium) to vacuum source - ensuring cleaner, safer workplace
  • This is an essential tool for aerospace, automotive, marine and transportation industries!
  • Each model includes 51346 Backing Pad, for 3 Inch (76 mm) diameter locking-type abrasive discs
  • Utilizes tool?s exhaust to create strong vacuum suction
  • 1 Inch (25 mm) diameter vacuum port ready for connection to optional portable self-contained dust collection system.
  • Standard Shroud height of 1-1/2 Inch (38 mm) accommodates 3 Inch (76 mm) diameter bristle-type discs (sold separately)
  • Standard Shroud may also be trimmed for customized applications
  • Vacuum Shroud constructed of high-quality clear urethane
  • Unique view -port allows operator to see edge of sanding disc, and offers optimum view of work surface
  • Flexible, non-marring Vacuum Shroud allows capture of dust, debris and contaminants (including Hexavalent Chromium)
  • Vacuum Shroud angle of 6 degrees ensures ideal surface contact for maximum debris extraction.
  • Wick-Lube system extends gear life with simple lubrication.
